  c(
    lbr_counties, lbr_districts, lbr_clans,
    urban_montserrado, grand_bassa,
    urban_montserrado_cmam_coverage, grand_bassa_cmam_coverage
  )
)

```{r grand_bassa_coverage}
pal <- colorNumeric(
  palette = brewer.pal(n = 10, name = "RdYlGn"), domain = c(0, 1)
)

gb_districts <- lbr_districts |>
  subset(admin1Name == "Grand Bassa")

y <- grand_bassa_cmam_coverage

leaflet(data = y, width = "100%", height = "100%") |>
  addMapboxTiles(
    style_id = "streets-v10",
    username = "mapbox"
  ) |>
  setView(
    lng = mean(st_bbox(grand_bassa)[c(1, 3)]), 
    lat = mean(st_bbox(grand_bassa)[c(2, 4)]),
    zoom = 10
  ) |>
  addPolygons(
    fillColor = ~pal(muac_screen),
    weight = 1,
    opacity = 1,
    color = ~pal(muac_screen),
    dashArray = "",
    fillOpacity = 0.7,
    highlight = highlightOptions(
      weight = 3,
      color = "#666",
      dashArray = "",
      fillOpacity = 0.7,
      bringToFront = TRUE
    ),
    label = ~paste0(
      "District: ", DNAME,
      "<br/>Clan: ", CLNAME, 
      "<br/>MUAC screening: ", round(muac_screen * 100, digits = 1), "%"
    ) |>
      lapply(htmltools::HTML),
    labelOptions = labelOptions(
      style = list("font-weight" = "normal", padding = "3px 8px"),
      textsize = "12px",
      direction = "auto"
    ),
    group = "MUAC Screening"
  ) |>
  addPolygons(
    fillColor = ~pal(oedema_screen),
    weight = 1,
    opacity = 1,
    color = ~pal(oedema_screen),
    dashArray = "",
    fillOpacity = 0.7,
    highlight = highlightOptions(
      weight = 3,
      color = "#666",
      dashArray = "",
      fillOpacity = 0.7,
      bringToFront = TRUE
    ),
    label = ~paste0(
      "District: ", DNAME,
      "<br/>Clan: ", CLNAME, 
      "<br/>Oedema screening: ", round(oedema_screen * 100, digits = 1), "%"
    ) |>
      lapply(htmltools::HTML),
    labelOptions = labelOptions(
      style = list("font-weight" = "normal", padding = "3px 8px"),
      textsize = "12px",
      direction = "auto"
    ),
    group = "Oedema Screening"
  ) |>
  addPolygons(
    fillColor = ~pal(case_finding),
    weight = 1,
    opacity = 1,
    color = ~pal(case_finding),
    dashArray = "",
    fillOpacity = 0.7,
    highlight = highlightOptions(
      weight = 3,
      color = "#666",
      dashArray = "",
      fillOpacity = 0.7,
      bringToFront = TRUE
    ),
    label = ~paste0(
      "District: ", DNAME,
      "<br/>Clan: ", CLNAME, 
      "<br/>Case-finding effectiveness: ", round(case_finding * 100, digits = 1), "%"
    ) |>
      lapply(htmltools::HTML),
    labelOptions = labelOptions(
      style = list("font-weight" = "normal", padding = "3px 8px"),
      textsize = "12px",
      direction = "auto"
    ),
    group = "Case-finding Effectiveness"
  ) |>
  addPolygons(
    fillColor = ~pal(treatment),
    weight = 1,
    opacity = 1,
    color = ~pal(treatment),
    dashArray = "",
    fillOpacity = 0.7,
    highlight = highlightOptions(
      weight = 3,
      color = "#666",
      dashArray = "",
      fillOpacity = 0.7,
      bringToFront = TRUE
    ),
    label = ~paste0(
      "District: ", DNAME,
      "<br/>Clan: ", CLNAME, 
      "<br/>Treatment coverage: ", round(treatment * 100, digits = 1), "%"
    ) |>
      lapply(htmltools::HTML),
    labelOptions = labelOptions(
      style = list("font-weight" = "normal", padding = "3px 8px"),
      textsize = "12px",
      direction = "auto"
    ),
    group = "Treatment Coverage"
  ) |>
  addPolygons(
    data = gb_districts,
    fill = FALSE,
    weight = 3,
    opacity = 1,
    color = "#808080",
    label = paste0("District: ", gb_districts$admin2NAME),
    labelOptions = labelOptions(
      style = list("font-weight" = "normal", padding = "3px 8px"),
      textsize = "12px",
      direction = "auto"
    ),
    group = "Grand Bassa Districts"
  ) |>
  addCircleMarkers(
    data = liberia::settlements,
    radius = 3,
    fillColor = "blue",
    weight = 1,
    opacity = 1,
    color = "blue",
    dashArray = "",
    fillOpacity = 0.7,
    label = paste0(
      "Settlement/Village: ", liberia::settlements$FNAME, 
      "<br/>County: ", liberia::settlements$admin1Name,
      "<br/>District: ", liberia::settlements$admin2Name
    ) |>
      lapply(htmltools::HTML),
    labelOptions = labelOptions(
      style = list("font-weight" = "normal", padding = "3px 8px"),
      textsize = "12px",
      direction = "auto"
    ),
    group = "Settlements/Villages"
  ) |>
  addLegend(
    pal = pal,
    opacity = 0.7,
    values = c(0, 1),
    position = "bottomright",
    labFormat = labelFormat(suffix = "%", transform = function(x) x * 100),
    layerId = "legend"
  ) |>
  addLayersControl(
		baseGroups = c("MUAC Screening", "Oedema Screening", 
		               "Case-finding Effectiveness", "Treatment Coverage"),
		overlayGroups = c("Grand Bassa Districts", "Settlements/Villages"),
		position = "topright",
		options = layersControlOptions(collapsed = FALSE, autoZIndex = TRUE)
	) |>
  htmlwidgets::onRender("
    function(el, x) {
      this.on('baselayerchange', function(e) {
        e.layer.bringToBack();
      })
    }
  ")
```
